title: An Open Letter To Riot About Taric and The Male Power Fantasy
body:
Dear Riot Game,

For once, I don't think a champion that is male and muscular and attractive plays into the male power fantasy (as literally every good-looking male and female character seems to do). 

Riot Games, I am appalled by your abhorrent display of sexism. You created a male character that does not play into the male power fantasy as much as it plays into the female power fantasy. 

I demand you change New Taric in ways that make the male power fantasy continue to trump the female one, because if females have nothing to complain about in video-games displaying good-looking male and female characters whom both play into only one power fantasy (the dominating male one), we're going to have a serious problem on our hands.

Thank you for taking the time to read my concern,

ChickenWrap
